about_the_game:
POP TOP Adventure Soundtrack now available on Steam!

If you're a POP TOP Adventure fan, you can now take the game experience beyond the screen with the official soundtrack available on Steam.

With 11 incredible tracks, each carefully selected to complement your journey, the soundtrack will transport you into the game's world even more immersively.

They're great for relaxing or getting motivated during the day, or even creating an engaging atmosphere at parties or other events.

Don't miss your chance to own the complete POP TOP Adventure soundtrack.
